name: GLAD VALAKAS TOWER DEFENCE 2
description:
2028. Due to the global economic crisis, Valera’s grandfather’s garage is attacked by many enemies who are trying to capture the hero’s golden bucket. Help Valera to repel the attacks of enemies and defend the most valuable thing for him.
You have to protect the base of the hero from the attacks of enemies. Shoot them with a variety of weapons, slow down with the help of special skills or chop them with a chainsaw. Your goal is to go through 4 chapters and defeat the final boss. Good luck!
Key features:
  • 4 chapters with new unique enemies
  • Comic Book Style Graphic
  • Great soundtrack
  • Steam Achievements
Coming Soon: Steam Trading Cards
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Bleak Fufel.
